author: Special Correspondent
text:
TANGEDCO grievance day meeting today

The Superintending Engineer, Madurai Electricity Distribution Circle, will conduct a meeting to hear grievances of power consumers of Madurai North Division on March 3, Thursday.

According to a Tamil Nadu Generation and Distribution Corporation press release, power consumers of Tamukkam, Race Course, Sellur, Tagore Nagar, Chokkikulam, Narimedu, Krishnapuram Colony, Tiruppalai, Anaiyur, Athikulam, Anna Nagar, K. K. Nagar, K. Pudur and Melamadai can present their grievances for redressal at the meeting to be held at the office of the Executive Engineer, North Division, K. Pudur, between 11 a.m. and 1 p.m.

A similar meeting for power consumers of Samayanallur Division will be held at the office of the Executive Engineer, Samayanallur, from 11 a.m. to 1.30 p.m. on March 3.
title: Grievance day
